description.narrative:
Destined Women is local not for profit, non-religious and nonpartisan community based Organization duly registered in June 2014 (CBO Reg No 02392017) to operate in the whole of Acholi Sub region. Our main office is located in Omoro district with projectoffices in Koro Sub County. Destined Women is made up of professional#s individuals with different areas of discipline and are committed to making a difference in the lives of Women in Northern Uganda.
The target group identified for the proposed project is the child Mother in the two sub counties of Omoro district. Child Mothers are female youth who are below the age of 18 at the time of first conception. The basis for implementing the project in the two sub counties having the highest in population,economic activities and high mobility. The two decade of civil war forced more than 1.8 million people including children and women into Internally Displaced Camps. Life in the displaced camps alone was horrible and with numerous cases of defilement, rapeand poor protection of especially the girl child.
The Child Mother Empowerment Project seeks to transform the socioeconomic life of the Child Mothers through Education and Information, life skill trainings and material supports in order for the child mothers to participate in making decision concerning their life and also able to define their destiny.
GOAL: Contribute towards changing the socioeconomic status of Child Mothers so as to participate and influence decisions concerning their life in eighteen (18) months.
Objectives: # To gain an updated status of child mothers through studies to enhances documentation and support. # To support formation of Child mother group for informationsharing on rights, opportunities, participation and makinginform decision. # To improve Child Mothers# life skill and employment opportunities through training and linkages to institutions. # To create a supportive environment for Child Mothers to exist and be free from harm and stigmatization through publicawareness creation. # To manage and coordinate the project implementation for positive outcomes.

participating-org.narrative:
DESTINED WOMEN was founded by 8 women in 2015, to help, advocate for women#s attainment of their destiny. As a result of our concerns as mothers we sat as a group to draw on strategies to address the plight of child mothers. Work started without any legal status but was later on register in 2015 as community based Organization in Omoro district. On registration we progress from working withmothers in the area of family planning to child mothers. Currently we handle both family planning and livelihood for child mothers
ACHIEVEMENTS What have been the principal results in the past three years that contribute to significant, structural, sustained andpositive improvement in the lives of men, women, girls and boys suffering from poverty, injustice, insecurity and exclusion?
Destined Women has successfully implemented the family planning project in a bid to curb down domestic violence amongst couples. We have also trained women on how save and manage saving schemes. The organization is currently managing Rwotayetwero Church Women#s Group and the HIV/AIDS counselling project for Child Mothers.
The project has changed the life of women in a way to space up birth hence address the issue of poverty brought by having many children, knowledge on savinghas changed the economic status as a result of saving and investing skills. INSTITUTIONAL PURPOSE The Vision: Vision To respond to adverse condition of women, and for women to reach their define destiny
Mission Statement:
Mission: What is the current purpose of the organisation?
DESTINED WOMEN is a CBO that advances women empowerment through information sharing and maximize resources to support the interest and rights of their target group to reach their final destiny. We share the risks andrewards of implementing innovative ideas, and capitalize on enduring successes. Institutional objectives: What are the principal changes the organisation seeks to achieve over the long term? (To make self-reliantamong vulnerable and marginalized childmothers) Destined WOMEN strives to contribute towards changing the socioeconomic status of Child Mothers by making them self-reliant so as to participate and influence decisions concerning their life in twelve months.
Field(s) of activity: What are theprincipal thematic and geographic areas in which the organisation works? Who are the social actors that benefit from the work? Destined Women has been providing social services related activities for underserved and unprivileged womenthrough psychosocial support, capacity building, and consultation services to beneficiaries. In addition, DESTINED WOMEN is a CBO that advances women empowerment through information, training <(>&<)> education, and maximize resources to support the mission of their target groupto reach their final destiny. All at the end shall enhance documentation and support to target group, defend of their rights and taking up of opportunities to participate and make informed decision, improve life skill and employment opportunities throughtraining and linkages to institutions improved safety and freedom from harm and stigmatization through public awareness creation.
4. STRATEGIC POSITIONING Analyse the environment in which the organisation works? Who are the other relevant socialactors, including government and business, and what roles do they play? #In this context, what is unique about the position of the organisation?
Our target group, the Child Mothers are very complex group of people. Because they have already faced stigmatization from all partof the society, they normally take time to open up, trust, gain confidence to work with others. Destined Women shall therefore use their past experiences and put extra care while serving them. Other social actors are the local governmentdepartment such as Labour,community development, health, Police and the LC 1. Social groups like the teachers associations and VHTS.
